attributes.action: Mandate Conscription for Asylum seekers as a condition of Citizenship
attributes.background: I want Conscription and National service for Asylum seekers as a condition of Citizenship and any conscription that sons of MPs and Lords to be first in line

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Make conscription a condition of citizenship for migrants who entered illegally
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/721538
